BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a searchable dashboard for notices of violation issued by the department of sanitation
Items.MatterName: Requiring a searchable dashboard for notices of violation issued by the department of sanitation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that notices of violation issued by the department of sanitation be accompanied by a photograph of the alleged violation
Items.MatterName: Requiring that notices of violation issued by the department of sanitation be accompanied by a photograph of the alleged violation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that all public waste receptacles be emptied by the department of sanitation at least once per day
Items.MatterName: Requiring that all public waste receptacles be emptied by the dept of sanitation at least once per day.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of sanitation to remove fallen tree limbs, branches, and vegetation that obstruct streets and sidewalks as a result of severe weather
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of sanitation to remove fallen tree limbs, branches, and vegetation that obstruct streets and sidewalks as a result of severe weather.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to collection of recyclable materials after a holiday
Items.MatterName: Collection of recyclable materials after a holiday.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the tracking of street cleaning operations online
Items.MatterName: The tracking of street cleaning operations online.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of sufficient receptacles for the storage of solid waste
Items.MatterName: Provision of sufficient receptacles for the storage of solid waste.
